What kind of mathematical object will the solution $\bf x$ to this matrix equation be?

$$\left(\begin{array}{r} 
8 & 9 & 6 \\ 
-4 & -3 & 9 \\ 
2 & 6 & 5\\
\end{array}\right) \ {\bf x} \ =
\left(\begin{array}{r} 
6 & 5 & 3 & 2 \\ 
-1 & 0 & 9 & 1 \\ 
1 & -8 & 9 & -1 \\ 
\end{array}\right)$$

```{mcq}
#| label: what-kinda-thing-3
#| inline: true
1. a scalar
2. a matrix with 2 rows and 4 columns
3. a matrix with 3 rows and 4 columns [correct]
4. a matrix with 4 rows and 4 columns
6. It's meaningless
```
